mapper.insert: insert ALL into team (T_NO, TEAMNAME, SUBJECT, T_SDATE, T_EDATE, LOC_CODE) values (SEQ_TEAM.nextval, #{teamname}, #{subject}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{loc_code}) into jointeam (T_NO, nickname, t_status) values (SEQ_TEAM.currval, #{nickname}, '2') select * from dual
mapper.select: select nickname from JOINTEAM where t_no = #{teamNum}
select t_no as no, nickname, t_status as status from jointeam where t_no = #{tNo} order by DECODE(T_status, 2, 1, 3, 2, 1, 3, 4)
mapper.delete: delete from jointeam where t_no = #{tNo} and nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.update: update jointeam set t_status = '3' where t_no = #{tNo} and nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select: select CHAT_NO as msgNo, nickname, content, T_NO as teamNo from TEAMCHAT where t_no = #{teamNum}
